Name: Amazon Web Services (AWS) data lake for analysis of COVID-19 data
Descrption: A centralized repository of up-to-date and curated datasets on or related to the spread and characteristics of SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19.
Data type: dashboards and visualization tools, epidemiology, healthcare resources, literature

Name: Amazon Web Services (AWS) data lake for analysis of COVID-19 data
Descrption: Powered by Atrio software platform offers easy access to large numbers of freely available, high-performing GPU and CPU resources. Contact support for help creating portable application containers that are performance optimized for these powerful systems.

Name: Data-Against-COVID Team
Descrption: A group of more than 600 volunteer data scientists, machines learning experts, bioinformaticians and professional software developers who have joined together to offer their expertise for any data analysis problems that arise in the context of the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.
